Mapper interface for converting between Comment entities and CommentResponseDTO or CommentRequestDTO objects.

Exception thrown when a comment with the specified ID is not found.

GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for handling specific exceptions across all controllers in the application.
JwtAuthenticationFilter
This filter is responsible for authenticating the user based on the JWT token provided in the HTTP request's Authorization header.

Enum representing the priority levels of a task.
